name: MPACEDAO #28
description: Fantasy Bear NFT is a collection of 5,000 unique characters. They are adventurers who like to be close to nature and are loyal friends of Mpace; the rarity is divided into 4 levels, of which 10% are super rare. Their main feature is that they have clean fur, wearing football and basketball clothes, glasses and hats against a background of unique fruit color schemes, they are the guardians of their homes.
